inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, Edition and Inscription

LRC, in pencil: [10 1/2]; on back, in pencil: [APG 15587]
provenance: (C. & J. Goodfriend, New York, until 2000; sold in September to Harry Drake); Harry Drake, St. Paul, 2000-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA
signed: LRC below image, in pencil: [Samuel Chamberlain]; bottom center, in pencil: [SENLIS, FRANCE 1925]
title: Springtime in Senlis
